content: A dream... I was trying to explain to St. Peter, and was doing it in the German tongue, because I didn't want to be too explicit.
translations: ita:Un sogno... stavo cercando di spiegare a San Pietro, e lo stavo facendo in lingua tedesca perch√© non volevo essere tropp
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by deniko (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
